Package edu.rpi.phil.legup

Class Summary
AppliedRule A rule that was applied as the transition between two states.
BoardLoader Parses the board file and loads the Initial and Goal Boards
BoardState Stores all the information related to a board state.
Config Contains any configuration information that has been loaded from a config file
ConfigImporter Parses the config file and loads the Config object
Legup The Legup class is the main class for the Legup Application.
LEGUPConsole Provides all the program functionality with a console interface
PuzzleModule Generic Puzzle class.
PuzzleRule Handles functionality for a Puzzle Rule.
TransitionCell A single cell change that should occur when transitioning from one state to the next.
